name: animalfinder
0:
”Alexa open animal finder”
”I want jungle animals”
”I want farm animals”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal finder
des:
The skill provides a sound and you have to guess to which animal the sound belongs to. At the beginning, the skill proposes to select among jungle or farm animals. Then Alexa will play an audio of an animal and you have to find the corresponding animal: lion, gorilla, monkey... if you don't find the animal, the skill shares a tip. Once you find the animal, you will get a explanation about the animal.

This educational skill is perfect for learning about animal and even learning english.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
